name: Ninth Life
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
My favorite part of doing deed is the chase
Put on this earth to relocate dirt like you back in its place
I don't need to hear your explanations of duties and ties
I'm only here for your fear
And to watch you die
[Verse 2]
Cry all you want, show me the fear in your eyes
I'll put you into your place and take all nine of your worthless lives
Everyone thinks they have the means
To take on and defeat me, but
I'm not here to work out deals
I'm just double-fronting sheep
[Verse 3]
I'm the one who waits out here in the dark
A superstitious entity with fuel sources and sparks
I'd set the world ablaze just to sit
And watch you burn
I'm not here to negotiate
You've a life to earn
[Verse 1]
My favorite part of doing deed is the chase
Put on this earth to relocate dirt like you back in its place
I don't need to hear your explanations of duties and ties
I'm only here for your fear
And to watch you die

Put on this earth to relocate dirt like you back in its place

Cry all you want, show me the fear in your eyes
I'll put you into your place and take all nine of your worthless lives
Everyone thinks they have the means

I'm not here to work out deals
I'm— take— of your worthless lives
